flavorText: Bolas cared little when his statue fell, thinking it a useful distraction, underestimating the surge of resolve it gave his opponents.

foreignData.flavorText: Bolas machte sich nichts daraus, als seine Statue fiel. Er hielt es für eine willkommene Ablenkung und unterschätzte, wie viel Mut seine Gegner bei dem Anblick schöpfen würden.

foreignData.flavorText: A Nicol Bolas poco le importó que su estatua cayera; pensó que era una distracción útil. Sin embargo, subestimó la resolución que este hecho otorgó a sus adversarios.

foreignData.flavorText: Bolas non si preoccupò quando la sua statua cadde, ritenendolo un diversivo utile e sottovalutando l'impeto di determinazione che diede ai suoi avversari.

foreignData.flavorText: ボーラスは自分の立像が倒されても気にしなかった。有効な気分転換と考え、その結果自分の敵の間に決意の奔流が巻き起こるとは思っていなかったのだ。

foreignData.flavorText: 볼라스는 자신의 석상이 쓰러짐으로써 자신의 적들이 다진 결의를 효과적인 시선 돌리기라고 생각하며 그다지 신경쓰지 않았다.
foreignData.name: 석상 넘어뜨리기
foreignData.text:
지속물을 목표로 정한다. 그 지속물을 탭한다. 그 지속물이 마법물체라면, 그 지속물을 파괴한다.
카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Nicol Bolas não se preocupou muito quando a própria estátua caiu. Considerou uma distração útil, subestimando a determinação que a queda instigou em seus oponentes.
foreignData.name: Derrubar a Estátua
foreignData.text:

foreignData.flavorText: Болас не придал значения падению своей статуи, подумав, что это только отвлечет врагов. Он недооценил тот прилив воодушевления, что они испытали.

name: Topple the Statue
originalText:
Tap target permanent. If it's an artifact, destroy it.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: Topple the Statue can target any permanent, even one that's already tapped.

If Topple the Statue targets an artifact, that artifact will be tapped if it's untapped, and then it'll be destroyed. Any abilities that trigger as it becomes tapped do so and will resolve after Topple the Statue has finished resolving.

If the target permanent is an illegal target when Topple the Statue tries to resolve, it doesn't resolve. You won't draw a card. If the target is legal but isn't tapped, isn't destroyed, or is neither tapped nor destroyed, you do draw a card.
